name: O Teddy Where Art Thou
description:
An atmospheric game about a teddy bear set off to find his missing parts. As you regain body parts, you widen your options related to the part collected. Something important is missing from the inside though, and lest you find it fast enough Teddy's game will be over.

Created for Global Game Jam 2021 by:

  • Arno Lehtonen (Development, Music)
  • Konstantin Zotov (Art)
  • Eetu Elo-Rauta (Story, Writing)
  • Jaakko Alanen (Development)
